## Setup

```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false

# Load libraries
library(here)
library(stars)
```

```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false

# Read in data

# Set path to geodatabase folder
gdb_path <- here('data/PMEP_biotic.gdb')

# List all layers
layers <- st_layers(gdb_path)

data <- st_read(gdb_path, layer = 'West_Coast_USA_Nearshore_CMECS_Substrate_Habitat_V2' )
```

```{r}
# Save file as RDS
saveRDS(data, "substrate.rds")
```
